Content_wSideColumn.Name: Rent Equipment
Content_wSideColumn.Title: Rent Equipment - ORC
Content_wSideColumn.Abstract: The launch point for everything that has to do with renting ORC equipment, whether you want information on group rates, group activities, pricing guides, or just general rental information and policies.

MoveLeft.label: Toggle column right or left (right is default)

fbookTop.label: Put facebook at top of page

fbookDisplayed.label: Number of facebook messages to display

Content_wSideColumn.BodyCopy:
At the ORC, we have a lot of different stuff you can rent.  You may have something specific in mind, or just want to browse through a list of what's available.  We like to divide up our rentals into two main categories, based on the season.  Look below to find the category that you're interested in.  We're pretty sure you'll find something you like.

All Season Items

Some of our items are perfect for any season.  Activities like camping, backpacking, and rock climbing can be done year-round.  You'll find these items on either one of the price guides listed below.  Really, try either one.  It's ok.

Summer Rentals

Summer rentals would include biking, kayaking, white water rafting, and things you generally don't want to do when it's freezing outside. View the summer rental price guide.

Winter Rentals

Winter rentals are items that generally require snow and/or ice.  This includes skiing, snowboarding, ice climbing, and more.  View the winter rental price guide.

Rental Policies

If you've never rented from us before, you may want to learn about our rental policies and what you can expect when you visit the store.  From here, you can go to the rental policies page to view information for reservations, policies, and our rental agreement.

Climbing Wall

If you're interested in renting the climbing wall for your next event, you'll find all the information you need right here.
